title: Is Galio worth a grab?
body:
A few days ago I was up against a Galio in mid (I was Kindred) and the guy not only seemed to be doing pretty okay he also seemed to be having alot of fun with him.

I know he is easily countered if you know what you are doing and that he isn't remotely the best mid laner. I just wanna know from a "Fun champ?" point of view is he worth a grab?

replies.body: he is a good counter pick vs ap comps. like a {{champion:33}} into ad, {{champion:3}} turns mr into ap. he is tanky with ranged abilties an aoe taunt for ult , but he is melee to last hit, and auto, he has high cooldowns and mana problems. his Q is a skill shot his W shields him or other allies if he wants granting more mr/armor and heals on damage taken. and his e is a linear skill shot that does damage and provides a path to increase speed while on it like {{champion:56}} Q. his best damage is to use W on self granting more mr therefore increasing your ap and then using Q or E

does the enemy have ap?
go full tank (mag res / health) and still burst them
does the enemy not have ap?
go full ap

he's very fun
he works good as a supp best though, since people usually can outlast him in  a 1 v 1 lane
always get a mana item as one of your first items too
{{champion:3}} is a niche pick and good vs ap mid laners {{champion:84}} {{champion:7}}
